text: hello this is Bill Cunningham and on the
street was a very interesting
observation to me at least is the
evolution of menswear from the
regimental look of the 1950s because
mostly weren't born then but you can't
imagine what it was like then no one
broke out of the dictated look whether
you liked it or not you just didn't and
it wasn't until the late 60s that things
began to crack and it'd been a 40-year
struggle since then you know it didn't
happen overnight and when you look
around the city today you see look at
the men going to work in the morning
with white trousers jackets or sport
jacket some with toys I'm without but
they would never have worn white
trousers that was something you wore in
Southampton into a cocktail party now
you wear it to work then you look over
and this man here is I think the chicest
man and the taste or the classic Disney
I mean absolutely superb but look at the
young men wearing suits everything
perfect except no socks or the young man
with his very severe suit but look at
his white sneakers you see that's the
freedom that comes with it and
rollerblading to work because that's not
new but yes it's new in the last 10
years look at this young man his running
sneakers to work he's changed to put on
his dress shoes and that again is in the
morning eight o'clock others you see
they have their sport jackets but they
wear them with jeans others have gotten
rid of the jacket and if everything else
but it's where the vest I mean it's his
mom was deconstruction of the rigidness
of men's clothes that really is what
today is all about there is no one look
a one trend that's absurd you wear
many different things for many different
activities obviously if you're going to
work in a very strict office you can't
dress like this but those fellows are
all without jackets their insurance and
chino trousers but it goes even further
and wonderful different colors and
sweaters and even a golfing fella on his
way to golf in his plaid trousers with
his Red Sox it's wonderful and then you
see a lot of these plant cutoff trousers
this summer they're everywhere but it
ends up with these kids I thought they
were terrific they were almost like neo
flower children you couldn't get me free
of it now I mean unless you didn't wear
any clothes at all and then I wouldn't
be interested all the new bodies look
alike that's a lot of baloney you know
what I mean you can go to the beach here
and settle there but as far as covering
the body and that's what's intriguing
look at the spectrum of men and the
freedoms they have
